outstanding strategy game i grew up with the original games during the 90s i still have 2 on cdrom somewhere and wanted to scratch the nostalgic itch so far it has exceeded all expectations the pace is perfect the worldbuilding is epic and the visuals are perfectly adequate the newer games looked a bit cartoonlike but this remains somewhat true to the original aesthetics whilst not looking outdated highly recommended if youre like me and want to relive past gaming experiences
